experience: You and Dallas both know Steven Roberts, Trish Bear, and 70 others
Dallas can introduce you to 12 people at Synergy HomeCare Franchising, LLC
Dallas worked at Synergy HomeCare Franchising, LLC
Experienced Franchisees Know When They Find an Amazing Opportunity
More than half of our franchisees own multiple franchise licenses and come from more than 28 other franchise systems where they have been franchise owners or regional developers.
Their success is a testament to the fact that the most important components of a successful, proven model are found in the Amazing Lash Studio Franchise opportunity.

Our Mission: "To create lasting beauty and confidence through passion, dedication, and excellence so our guests will look and feel amazing!"  I am so fortunate to wake up every morning with an eagerness to work and to help others achieve their goals!  This is an AMAZING journey :)

Amazing Lash Studio is dedicated to raising the bar on perfection, lasting beauty, and professionalism in eyelash extensions as well as promoting integrity and values in business ethics.Our passion for making a difference in the beauty industry is matched by our dedication to developing studio locations, procedures, and systems of the highest caliber. We bring together a unique set of highly trained individuals, with the common goal to become the Gold Standard for the beauty industry.The market for eyelash extensions is fairly new, with very few competing franchise opportunities.  First-to-market Opportunity As an Amazing Lash Studio franchise owner, you can be at the forefront in this emerging industry with a proven leadership team that includes the founder of Massage Envy, John Leonesio.Proven Business Model Amazing Lash Studio offers a recognized, polished, and specialized business model that is above other independent lash salons. Specialized Business Other general beauty salons provide lash extensions as a “side offering”. Amazing Lash Studio specializes in eyelash extensions resulting in extremely efficient operations. Mounting Service Popularity Our services target women from a wide range of age groups. Offered year-round, and by appointment, you will be able to project business volume month by month and adapt to your business growth accordingly.

Beautiful eyelashes are more convenient and affordable than ever now thanks to Amazing Lash Studio. The licensed cosmetologists and estheticians at Amazing Lash Studio are devoted exclusively to the art of lash beauty, and utilize a patented technique to apply individual semi-permanent extensions directly to your existing lashes so the look is more natural than strip extensions.  Our upscale studios are designed for your comfort, and feature individual, private lash application rooms.  We are open 7 days a week, with extended evening hours to fit your busy lifestyle.

RedLine Athletics is dedicated to providing the finest training regimen that will be uniquely adapted to each individual athlete. RedLine trainers work closely with each client to create a specialized program to develop core stability, speed improvement, running form, acceleration, agility and strength. RedLine Athletics provides athletic training to clients of all ages but specializes in sports specific training of young athletes in the 8-18 age group. This start up franchise system has more than 100 units under development through regional developers in Arizona, California, Florida, Virginia and Texas. Regional developer rights are being awarded in all 50 states.

The mission of The Arc of Tempe is to empower and enrich the lives of persons with developmental disabilities by teaching self-advocacy, life-skills and civic involvement through hands-on learning and recreational activities.

Synergy HomeCare is a national franchisor of home care offices. Founded in 2001, Synergy now has more than 235 units operating in 41 states and was ranked as the 175th largest franchise system in Entrepreneur Magazine's 2013 Franchise 500 Ranking.This leadership position is responsible for all consumer and health care referral marketing programs as well as franchise sales marketing support.  Key areas of influence include website development, digital marketing (SEO, SEM, PPC), direct response marketing, e-mail newsletters, social media outreach, public relations, professional health care referral programs, local advertising, regional advertising, coop development and national media. Launched new consumer website using responsive design technology to leverage growing trend towards traffic from mobile devices like smart phones and tablets. Implemented content marketing strategy that featured white papers, how to guides, video and training content designed to engage and convert visitors to prospect leads then clients. B2B marketing focused on franchise recruitment lead generation, lead warming drip campaigns and discovery day presentations.

summary: •	Effective high performance team builder with experience recruiting, leading and retaining a talented departmental staff.•	Strategic brand marketer with experience leading and growing  national and regional brands in service, healthcare, wellness, franchising and retail sectors. Successful in growing business to business markets as well as direct to consumer.•	Comprehensive digital marketing skills from strategy through execution. Extensive experience in integrated marketing that maximizes the effectiveness of all channels making their combined benefit greater than the sum of their parts. •	Strong communication skills result in the ability to connect with multiple audiences including consumers, employees, volunteers, suppliers, government agencies and franchise business partners. •	Responsible manager with experience overseeing annual marketing budgets in excess of $25,000,000.•	Respected leader of external resources such as advertising agencies, public relations agencies, video producers, website developers, and commercial printers. •	Successful new product marketer with experience developing and launching consumer products and services ranging from hot prepared entrées in supermarkets to branded facials in wellness franchises.Specialties: Consumer marketing, marketing management, strategic marketing, strategic planning, corporate communications,  content marketing, internet marketing, loyalty marketing, B2B marketing, CRM, SEO, SEM, web development, social media strategy,  market research,  pricing strategy, sales management, call center management, training, consumer promotions, brand management, brand strategy
name: Dallas Bennewitz
title: C-Level Operations and Marketing Executive
